definition: A term commonly used to refer to the type or genre of music that an individual holds a strong personal preference for, often indicating their favorite or preferred style of music.

examples.german: Ich h√∂re gerne meine Lieblingsmusik beim Autofahren.
examples.english: I like to listen to my favorite music while driving.
Favorite music can improve the mood.

examples.german: Sie spielt ihre Lieblingsmusik auf der Gitarre.
examples.english: She plays her favorite music on the guitar.
